pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyls-flake8A Flake8 plugin for the[Python LSP Server](https://github.com/python-lsp/python-lsp-server).Install this plugin in the same environment as `python-lsp-server`:```shellpip install pyls-flake8```pyls-flake8 will read its config from your project's ``setup.cfg``,``tox.ini`` or ``.flake8`` file if it has one.
